Description:
Sales Strategy: Develop and implement effective sales strategies, plans, and tactics to achieve sales targets and revenue growth in the electrical supplies sector.
Team Management: Lead, coach, and motivate the sales team, setting clear objectives and providing guidance to ensure high performance and goal attainment.
Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, understanding their needs, and ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction.
Business Development: Identify new business opportunities and potential clients to expand the customer base and increase market share.
Sales Forecasting and Reporting: Prepare sales forecasts and periodic sales reports, providing insights into performance, trends, and opportunities.Salary and Benefits:Salary shall be Qr. 7000.00 negotiable.
Company car shall be provided.
Yearly leave and leave salary.
Target shall be fixed on mutual discussion.
Sales commission shall be fixed on mutual discussion.
Any other concerns to be discussed.Skills
Skills:
Must be Electrical Graduate.
Must have Qatar Driving Licence.
Must have not less than 5 years’ experience in the same field.
Must have extensive knowledge of the products.
Must have pleasant personality.
Age must be less than 30 years.
Visa must be transferable, if available or visa shall be provided by the company.
Any nationality meets above criteria shall be considered.
Must have not less than 5 years’ experience in the same field.
